str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To proclaim, herald, preach. Of uncertain affinity; to herald, especially divine truth.
Everywhere, in all places. Genitive case of a presumed derivative of pas; universally.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To cooperate with, work together. From sunergos; to be a fellow-worker, i.e. Co-operate.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To confirm, ratify, secure, establish; pass: I guarantee. From bebaios; to stabilitate.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the base of semaino; an indication, especially ceremonially or supernaturally.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: To follow close after, accompany, dog; I imitate, pursue, be studious of. From epi and akoloutheo; to accompany.
